text: The 1965 Fresno State Bulldogs football team represented Fresno State CollegeCalifornia State University, Fresno was known as Fresno State College from 1949 to 1971. during the 1965 NCAA College Division football season. The team was led by second-year head coach Phil Krueger and played home games at Ratcliffe Stadium on the campus of Fresno City College in Fresno, California. They finished the season with a record of six wins and four losses (6–4, 1–3 CCAA). ==Schedule== ==Team players in the NFL== No Fresno State Bulldogs were selected in the 1966 NFL Draft. ==Notes== ==References== Fresno State Category:Fresno State Bulldogs football seasons Fresno State Bulldogs f
